A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've read more star wars books than most people have read books all together. This was a good movie. The wannabe directors claiming this doesn't feel like a star wars film must have missed Empire Strikes back. There's more humor than usual in this one\, but it doesn't lead you to believe the situation is any less desperate. The action is constant and the various side plots look to be setting up the future of the series. A great film\, but one you'll likely have to see a few times to keep up with the breakneck pace.
